1.title: The Vegan
1.plot: Know when you wake up well with life and face, "inadvertently, of course !!!" Kkkk, with that message in the Whatsapp of the AMAZING PERSON who soon drops a bomb in his day? Want to know how to handle the flea behind the ear? He comes with Jaque to know the opinion of Marcelinho - a legitimate Macho Alpha - because we are the time for men to vent here in the Zen Mine. We are of these: De-mo-crá-ti-cas. Want to know how to solve the "Zen Point" of this overwhelming question? Come with us, because our weapon is Zen.

2.title: Flerting
2.plot: Come with Silviane Consuelo - Musa Fitness and Digital Influencer -, learn advanced methods on how to "protect" your crush in the gym and still make "that" Flerting.

3.title: Casas Temmer, The house of the macho coupist.
3.plot: Casas Temmer, a house of the macho coupist.

4.title: Valentine's Day
4.plot: Do you have no money to buy that gift of the time to give your little girl on "Valentine's Day"? Marcelinho Guaxupé will teach you how to make a present that Mina will go all pirá with him. Already?. So come with us, because our weapon is Zen.

5.title: Tincture and Treatment to Raise Your Hair
5.plot: Do you know when you hit that arduous crisis of Self Esteem and you dislike trying to be someone else? Nalva de Jesus is going to teach you a damn good recipe for you, so I set it right out of your life. Come with us, because our weapon is Zen.

6.title: Class Struggle
6.plot: Do you know when that figure turned inside out who thinks he owns the world? Meet Sofia Bragança, a species that must be extinguished urgently in Brazil and in the world. Come with us, because our weapon is Zen.

7.title: M.I.T.O.
7.plot: Do you know that monkey incubated, that is in the face that loves to burn the thread, but that makes the line "trophy troglodyte" to be able to face everyone? You stand before the "M.I.T.O". Want to know what a M.I.T.O? Come with us, because our weapon is Zen.

8.title: Maternity Leave
8.plot: Tired of the feminist oppression of the males? Meet the PLM, the Men's Liberation Party. He comes with Marcelinho Guaxupé, his candidate for Federal Deputy in 2018, to fight for the right of the male to be MALE again ...? Come with us, because our weapon is Zen.

9.title: Love Application
9.plot: Get to know the application that will revolutionize women's lives: The "I-Warned You". The first Love relationship in the world Specializing in man evaluation By the only person who can Truly about it: its EX WOMAN.

locations: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
imdb.plot outline: Educated to be an independent and secure woman, Jaqueline Andrade - a successful psychologist who applies Zen Buddhist philosophy to resolving marital conflicts - plunges into a complex personality crisis when, at the age of 30, an unexpected overwhelming passion hits her Feminist values.
imdb.title: Mina Zen
plot: "_Mina Zen_ (qv)" is a series of sharp, critical black humor about the "30-year crisis of women" and the daily struggles of modern women for affirmation and empowerment.::Gleyson Spadetti

Educated to be an independent and secure woman, Jaqueline Andrade - a successful psychologist who applies Zen Buddhist philosophy to resolving marital conflicts - plunges into a complex personality crisis when, at the age of 30, an unexpected overwhelming passion hits her Feminist values.::Gleyson Spadetti
